channel.title: Studies on Dolphin NIE

item.title: Hugo and Gokarna: How to modify my website
item.description: 0. Get My Website Clone the Website From Github git clone --recurse-submodules https://github.com/NYH-Dolphin/nyh-dolphin.github.io.git This will both clone the website repo, and the gonkarna submodule. Bind BaseURL Under the root folder, open cmd. hugo server --bind=127.0.0.1 --baseURL=https://NYH-Dolphin.github.io 1. Modify Gokarna Multilanguage Copy the files from i18n/ to themes/gokarna/i18n/ Under the themes/gokarna/layouts/partials/header.html add the language switching code snap to the proper position, after .Site.Menus.main block. <span class="nav-language-divider"></span> {{ with .Translations }} {{ range .
